text: (The) King of Comedy may refer to: * Jerry Lewis (1926–2017), American comedian, actor, writer and director. Nicknamed for his role in the 1983 Martin Scorsese film of the same name ** Lewis's 1996 biography by Shawn Levy is titled King of Comedy: The Art and Life of Jerry Lewis * King of Comedy: The Art and Life of Jerry Lewis, a 1996 book by Shawn Levy about Jerry Lewis * Dolphy (1928–2012), Filipino actor known as "Comedy King" * Mack Sennett (1880–1960), nicknamed the King of Comedy ** Sennett's 1954 memoir is titled King of Comedy * The King of Comedy (film), a 1982 film directed by Martin Scorsese starring Robert De Niro and Jerry Lewis * "King of Comedy" (song), a song by R.E.M. on their album Monster * The Original Kings of Comedy, a 2000 Spike Lee film * The Original Latin Kings of Comedy, a 2002 Jeb Brien film * King of Comedy (film), a 1999 Hong Kong Television Broadcast film starring Stephen Chow * Kings of Comedy, a 2004 reality TV series about competing stand-up comics
title: The King of Comedy
